weather_app.views module

weather_app.views.get_weather(city)

Get the weather data for a given city using the OpenWeatherMap API.

Parameters:

city (str) – the name of the city to get the weather data for

Returns:

a dictionary containing various weather information for the city

Return type:

dict

weather_app.views.index(request)

View function that renders the index.html template with the current weather and datetime.

Parameters:

request (django.http.HttpRequest) – the HTTP request object

Returns:

an HTTP response with the rendered index.html template

Return type:

django.http.HttpResponse
